title: Scale mail
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Scale Mail    |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | Small, Medium |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 6             |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | 10            |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +6            |
| Grants                                                         | nothing       |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5             |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A leather suit covered with metal plates attached to each other in overlapping rows to provide full protection, but at the cost of reduced freedom of movement. |

**Scale mail** is a medium [body armour](/Body_armour "Body armour"), providing moderate physical defense coupled with a significant [encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating").

## Desirability

Scale mail is a medium-weight armour, offering moderate defense, but at a significant cost to evasion and spellcasting success. Early on, high-[strength](/Strength "Strength") characters may be grateful to find a scale mail on the first few floors. With [strength](/Strength "Strength") in the upper teens, many low-level spells should be castable.

However, the stats of a scale mail aren't terribly impressive. Some EV-based melee fighters may like one, but most characters will prefer either lighter or heavier. Still, if found with a solid enchantment rating and [ego](/Ego "Ego"), or in the form of an excellent [randart](/Randart "Randart"), scale mail *might* be worth using for a while.

A plain +0 scale mail is completely outclassed by [acid dragon scales](/Acid_dragon_scales "Acid dragon scales").

|              | Image                                                                     |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Mundane**  | [![Scale mail1.png](/images/f/f2/Scale_mail1.png)](/File:Scale_mail1.png) |
| **Magical**  | [![Scale mail2.png](/images/a/a3/Scale_mail2.png)](/File:Scale_mail2.png) |
| **Artefact** | [![Scale mail3.png](/images/4/48/Scale_mail3.png)](/File:Scale_mail3.png) |

## History

Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), scale mail had an encumbrance rating of 11.

html:
Scale mail

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Scale Mail
Size to wear Small, Medium
Armour Class 6
Encumbrance rating 10
Maximum Enchantment +6
Grants nothing
Time to Wear 5


A leather suit covered with metal plates attached to each other in overlapping rows to provide full protection, but at the cost of reduced freedom of movement.

Scale mail is a medium body armour, providing moderate physical defense coupled with a significant encumbrance rating.

Desirability

Scale mail is a medium-weight armour, offering moderate defense, but at a significant cost to evasion and spellcasting success. Early on, high-strength characters may be grateful to find a scale mail on the first few floors. With strength in the upper teens, many low-level spells should be castable.

However, the stats of a scale mail aren't terribly impressive. Some EV-based melee fighters may like one, but most characters will prefer either lighter or heavier. Still, if found with a solid enchantment rating and ego, or in the form of an excellent randart, scale mail might be worth using for a while.

A plain +0 scale mail is completely outclassed by acid dragon scales.

Image
Mundane
Magical
Artefact

History

Prior to 0.16, scale mail had an encumbrance rating of 11.

Armour
Body Armour Leather armour • Ring mail • Scale mail • Chain mail • Plate armour • Crystal plate armour
